experience.description:
- Work on [**DLSS (Deep Learning Super Sampling)**](https://news.developer.nvidia.com/dlss-what-does-it-mean-for-game-developers), one of **Nvidia Turing GPU**'s major feature for **real-time anti-aliasing** and **upscaling** on latest **AAA video games** 
 - Work on other projects like **style transfer** for portraits with **autoencoders**, etc

- Work on a fast and accurate **semantic similarity engine**, for search and recommendation, using a **state-of-the-art multilingual DistilBERT**-based model and **ANNG** search in **Python** and **Rust** 
 - Deployed our **microservice architecture** in production using **Kubernetes** and a complete stack of tools for **benchmarking**, **testing**, **monitoring**, **logging** and **reporting** 
 - **Prototype** work on a **fast high-quality face swap** algorithm
